title: 81x20: Matters of a Personal and Individual Nature and 18 U.S.C. § 207(c)
summary: A former senior employee would not violate 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) if his name was placed on an active list of arbitrators maintained by the agency under the subsection (i) exemption for matters “of a personal and individual nature” where the agency maintained the list and had no control over who was selected from the list by parties to an arbitration.
